content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Central management of Deep Discovery Inspector detection rules in Network Analysis Configuration June 23, 2025—You can now manage detection rules in Network Analysis Configuration for all connected Deep Discovery Inspector appliances version 6.8 Service Pack 1 or later by enabling central management for Deep Discovery Inspector resources. For more information, see Detection Rules. Network Security → Network Analysis Configuration © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Central management of Deep Discovery Inspector detection rules in Network Analysis Configuration
